name: Zoom Web Client SDK Sample Signature Node.js
description: Genrerate a signature to Start and Join Meetings and Webinars with the Zoom Web Client SDK.

ZOOM_JWT_API_KEY.description: Your Zoom JWT App API Key, found on your Zoom JWT App Credentials page

ZOOM_JWT_API_SECRET.description: Your Zoom JWT App API Secret, found on your Zoom JWT App Credentials page
